logger_file: {string: file to be used for logging}
source_directory: {string: directory with the csv files to upload to influxdb}
target_directory: {string: directory where the csv files will be moved to after uploading}
failed_directory: {string: directory where the csv files will be moved to if there's an error}

database.name: {string: name of the influxdb database to connect to}
database.user: {string: username to be used to connect to influxdb}
